duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee bookkeeping and payroll processing duties
Manage accounts receivable and payment processing
Supervise hourly staff and their training
Organize and schedule appointments as well as client information intake
Audit prepared tax returns for accuracy before filing

education_certification.credential: Prior experience in an office setting preferred
Working knowledge of office equipment (printers, scanners, phone, etc.)
Proficiency in MS Office (MS Excel and MS Word)
Excellent time management skills and the ability to prioritize work
Attention to detail and problem-solving skills
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Organizational skills with the ability to multi-task
Experience with QuickBooks Desktop and Online preferred
Prior experience with an accounting firm preferred
